thread.title: China opposes US sanctions on Iran involving Chinese firms
thread.title_full: China opposes US sanctions on Iran involving Chinese firms

title: China opposes US sanctions on Iran involving Chinese firms
text:
China opposes US sanctions on Iran involving Chinese firms Xinhua | Updated: 2017-02-07 01:47 
BEIJING - China has lodged representations to the United States over the latest sanctions against Iran which involve Chinese companies and individuals. 
Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Lu Kang made the remarks at a routine press briefing Monday. 
The United States on Friday announced sanctions on multiple entities and individuals involved in Iran's ballistic missile program and in providing support to a military force in Iran, including two Chinese companies and three individuals, according to reports. 
"China always opposes any unilateral sanctions, especially when they harm the interests of a third party," Lu said, adding such sanctions are "not helpful" to promoting mutual trust and solving global issues. Photo
